title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 1015.2 - Confidential nature of statements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 1015.2 - Confidential nature of statements

State Regulations
(a) All statements filed pursuant to sections
1022.2
and
1022.3
of this Title and the
contents thereof shall be available to only those individuals designated by
written order of a Justice of the Appellate Division. (b) The Office of Court Administration shall
microfilm all such statements and shall thereafter destroy the originals. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
1015.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
